channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5912|2024-06-06T18:47:37.560Z -- lenovo -- notebook%20bios
item.description: A potential memory leakage vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Notebook products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-5078|2023-11-08T22:02:49.076Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20bios
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some ThinkPad BIOS that could allow a physical or local attacker with elevated privileges to tamper with BIOS firmware.

item.title: CVE-2023-5081|2024-01-19T20:07:36.051Z -- lenovo -- tablet
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo Tab M8 HD that could allow a local application to gather a non-resettable device identifier.

item.title: CVE-2023-5080|2024-01-19T20:06:30.375Z -- lenovo -- tablet
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo tablet products that could allow local applications access to device identifiers and system commands.

item.title: CVE-2023-5079|2023-11-08T22:03:43.746Z -- lenovo -- lecloud%20application
item.description: Lenovo LeCloud App improper input validation allows attackers to access arbitrary components and arbitrary file downloads, which could result in information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2023-5075|2023-11-08T22:01:34.869Z -- lenovo -- ideapad%20duet%203-10igl5
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the FmpSipoCapsuleDriver driver in the IdeaPad Duet 3-10IGL5 that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-0896|2023-05-01T13:52:23.203Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20smart%20clock%20essential%20with%20alexa%20built%20in
item.description: A default password was reported in Lenovo Smart Clock Essential with Alexa Built In that could allow unauthorized device access to an attacker with local network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-0683|2023-05-01T14:23:12.987Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A valid, authenticated XCC user with read only access may gain elevated privileges through a specifically crafted API call.

item.title: CVE-2023-29058|2023-04-28T20:47:46.172Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A valid, authenticated XCC user with read-only permissions can modify custom user roles on other user accounts and the user trespass message through the XCC CLI. There is no exposure if SSH is disabled or if there are no users assigned optional read-only permissions.

item.title: CVE-2023-29057|2023-04-28T20:53:13.267Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A valid XCC user's local account permissions overrides their active directory permissions under specific configurations. This could lead to a privilege escalation. To be vulnerable, LDAP must be configured for authentication/authorization and logins configured as “Local First, then LDAP”.

item.title: CVE-2023-29056|2023-04-28T21:07:40.439Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A valid LDAP user, under specific conditions, will default to read-only permissions when authenticating into XCC. To be vulnerable, XCC must be configured to use an LDAP server for Authentication/Authorization and have the login permission attribute not defined.

item.title: CVE-2023-4856|2024-06-04T17:27:25.529Z -- lenovo -- smm%2C%20smm2%2C%20fpc
item.description: A format string vulnerability was identified in SMM/SMM2 and FPC that could allow an authenticated user to execute arbitrary commands on a specific API endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2023-4030|2023-08-17T16:48:47.172Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in BIOS for ThinkPad P14s Gen 2, P15s Gen 2, T14 Gen 2, and T15 Gen 2 that could cause the system to recover to insecure settings if the BIOS becomes corrupt.

item.title: CVE-2023-4857|2024-04-15T18:00:03.660Z -- lenovo -- smm%2C%20smm2%2C%20fpc
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability was identified in SMM/SMM2 and FPC that could allow an authenticated user to execute certain IPMI calls that could lead to exposure of limited system information.

item.title: CVE-2023-4606|2023-10-24T20:25:09.243Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20controller%20%28xcc%29
item.description:
An authenticated XCC user with Read-Only permission can change a different user’s password through a crafted API command.
This affects ThinkSystem v2 and v3 servers with XCC; ThinkSystem v1 servers are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2023-4607|2023-10-24T20:25:30.100Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20controller%20%28xcc%29
item.description: An authenticated XCC user can change permissions for any user through a crafted API command.

item.title: CVE-2023-4608|2023-10-24T20:25:49.416Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20controller%20%28xcc%29
item.description:
An authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges can perform blind SQL injection in limited cases through a crafted API command.
This affects ThinkSystem v2 and v3 servers with XCC; ThinkSystem v1 servers are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2023-4632|2023-11-08T21:58:22.692Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20system%20update
item.description: An uncontrolled search path vulnerability was reported in Lenovo System Update that could allow an attacker with local access to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-4891|2023-11-08T22:00:54.309Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20view%20driver
item.description: A potential use-after-free vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo View driver that could result in denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-4605|2024-04-05T20:44:43.105Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20administrator
item.description: A valid authenticated Lenovo XClarity Administrator (LXCA) user can potentially leverage an unauthenticated API endpoint to retrieve system event information.

item.title: CVE-2023-4706|2023-11-08T21:59:24.521Z -- lenovo -- 1lenovo%20preload%20directory
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo preloaded devices deployed using Microsoft AutoPilot under a standard user account due to incorrect default privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-4028|2023-08-17T16:48:06.884Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20notebook
item.description: A buffer overflow has been identified in the SystemUserMasterHddPwdDxe driver in some Lenovo Notebook products which may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-4855|2024-06-04T17:27:12.561Z -- lenovo -- smm%2C%20smm2%2C%20fpc
item.description: A command injection vulnerability was identified in SMM/SMM2 and FPC that could allow an authenticated user with elevated privileges to execute unauthorized commands via IPMI.

item.title: CVE-2023-4029|2023-08-17T16:48:24.711Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad
item.description: A buffer overflow has been identified in the BoardUpdateAcpiDxe driver in some Lenovo ThinkPad products which may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43577|2023-11-08T22:38:22.292Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the ReFlash module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43576|2023-11-08T22:37:43.945Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the WMISwSmi module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43567|2023-11-08T22:04:47.676Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the LemSecureBootForceKey module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43571|2023-11-08T22:18:31.018Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the BiosExtensionLoader module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43570|2023-11-08T22:07:32.645Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the SMI callback function of the OemSmi driver that may allow a local attacker with elevated permissions to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43573|2023-11-08T22:34:34.124Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the LEMALLDriversConnectedEventHook module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43569|2023-11-08T22:06:52.623Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the OemSmi module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43568|2023-11-08T22:05:53.826Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer over-read was reported in the LemSecureBootForceKey module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to disclose sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-43572|2023-11-08T22:33:42.317Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer over-read was reported in the BiosExtensionLoader module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to disclose sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-43579|2023-11-08T22:23:54.660Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the SmuV11Dxe driver in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43580|2023-11-08T22:24:39.492Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the SmuV11DxeVMR module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43575|2023-11-08T22:37:04.075Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the UltraFunctionTable module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43574|2023-11-08T22:35:35.999Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description:
A buffer over-read was reported in the LEMALLDriversConnectedEventHook module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges
to disclose sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-43581|2023-11-08T22:25:28.020Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the Update_WMI module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-43578|2023-11-08T22:21:21.705Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios
item.description: A buffer overflow was reported in the SmiFlash module in some Lenovo Desktop products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-34421|2023-06-26T19:45:26.406Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator
item.description: A valid, authenticated LXCA user with elevated privileges may be able to replace filesystem data through a specifically crafted web API call due to insufficient input validation.

item.title: CVE-2023-34420|2023-06-26T19:45:12.130Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator
item.description: A valid, authenticated LXCA user with elevated privileges may be able to execute command injections through crafted calls to a specific web API.

item.title: CVE-2023-34419|2023-08-17T16:49:12.282Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20notebook
item.description: A buffer overflow has been identified in the SetupUtility driver in some Lenovo Notebook products which may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-34422|2023-06-26T19:45:31.576Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator
item.description: A valid, authenticated LXCA user with elevated privileges may be able to delete folders in the LXCA filesystem through a specifically crafted web API call due to insufficient input validation.

item.title: CVE-2023-34418|2023-06-26T19:45:05.363Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator
item.description: A valid, authenticated LXCA user may be able to gain unauthorized access to events and other data stored in LXCA due to a SQL injection vulnerability in a specific web API.

item.title: CVE-2023-45077|2023-11-08T22:38:59.712Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A memory leakage vulnerability was reported in the 534D0740 DXE driver that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-45076|2023-11-08T22:28:20.459Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A memory leakage vulnerability was reported in the 534D0140 DXE driver that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-45075|2023-11-08T22:27:32.659Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A memory leakage vulnerability was reported in the SWSMI_Shadow DXE driver that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-45079|2023-11-08T22:32:37.592Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A memory leakage vulnerability was reported in the NvmramSmm SMM driver that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-45078|2023-11-08T22:30:49.077Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A memory leakage vulnerability was reported in the DustFilterAlertSmm SMM driver that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-25492|2023-05-01T14:11:48.551Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A valid, authenticated user may be able to trigger a denial of service of the XCC web user interface or other undefined behavior through a format string injection vulnerability in a web interface API.

item.title: CVE-2023-25493|2024-04-05T20:46:00.491Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-25494|2024-04-05T20:46:09.016Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20bios%2C%20smart%20edge%20bios%2C%20thinkstation%20bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability were reported in the BIOS of some Desktop, Smart Edge, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.

item.title: CVE-2023-25495|2023-04-28T21:26:12.202Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A valid, authenticated administrative user can query a web interface API to reveal the configured LDAP client password used by XCC to authenticate to an external LDAP server in certain configurations. There is no exposure where no LDAP client password is configured

item.title: CVE-2023-25496|2023-04-28T21:13:41.817Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20drivers%20management
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Drivers Management Lenovo Driver Manager that could allow a local user to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-3078|2024-01-03T21:10:30.242Z -- lenovo -- universal%20device%20client%20%28udc%29
item.description: An uncontrolled search path vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo Universal Device Client (UDC) that could allow an attacker with local access to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-3112|2023-10-24T20:31:09.667Z -- lenovo -- elliptic%20labs%20virtual%20lock%20sensor
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in Elliptic Labs Virtual Lock Sensor for ThinkPad T14 Gen 3 that could allow an attacker with local access to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-3113|2023-06-26T19:44:58.093Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator
item.description: An unauthenticated XML external entity injection (XXE) vulnerability exists in LXCA's Common Information Model (CIM) server that could result in read-only access to specific files.

item.title: CVE-2023-6450|2024-01-19T20:09:59.870Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20app%20store%20application
item.description: An incorrect permissions vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo App Store app that could allow an attacker to use system resources, resulting in a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-6338|2024-01-03T21:00:26.988Z -- lenovo -- universal%20device%20client%20%28udc%29
item.description: Uncontrolled search path vulnerabilities were reported in the Lenovo Universal Device Client (UDC) that could allow an attacker with local access to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-6044|2024-01-19T20:09:05.706Z -- lenovo -- vantage
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Vantage that could allow a local attacker with physical access to impersonate Lenovo Vantage Service and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-6043|2024-01-19T20:08:26.945Z -- lenovo -- vantage
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Vantage that could allow a local attacker to bypass integrity checks and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-6540|2024-01-03T21:01:59.690Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20browser%20mobile
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo Browser Mobile and Lenovo Browser HD Apps for Android that could allow an attacker to craft a payload that could result in the disclosure of sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-2992|2023-06-26T19:44:40.121Z -- lenovo -- system%20management%20module%20%28smm%29
item.description: An unauthenticated denial of service vulnerability exists in the SMM v1, SMM v2, and FPC management web server which can be triggered under crafted conditions. Rebooting SMM or FPC will restore access to the management web server.

item.title: CVE-2023-2290|2023-06-26T19:44:19.989Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the LenovoFlashDeviceInterface SMI handler may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-2993|2023-06-26T19:44:50.040Z -- lenovo -- system%20management%20module%20%28smm%29
item.description: A valid, authenticated user with limited privileges may be able to use specifically crafted web management server API calls to execute a limited number of commands on SMM v1, SMM v2, and FPC that the user does not normally have sufficient privileges to execute.

item.title: CVE-2024-27912|2024-04-05T20:47:09.905Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Printers that could allow an attacker to cause the device to crash by sending crafted LPD packets.

item.title: CVE-2024-27908|2024-06-04T17:47:05.996Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability was reported in the HTTPS service of some Lenovo Printers that could result in denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-27909|2024-04-05T20:46:46.021Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in the HTTPS service of some Lenovo Printers that could result in a system reboot.

item.title: CVE-2024-27910|2024-04-05T20:46:55.352Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to reboot the printer without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-27911|2024-04-05T20:47:01.657Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to obtain the administrator password.

item.title: CVE-2024-23594|2024-04-15T18:01:23.230Z -- lenovo -- windows%207%20and%208%20pc%20preloads
item.description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability was reported
in a system recovery bootloader that was part of the Lenovo preloaded Windows 7 and 8 operating systems from 2012 to 2014
that could allow a privileged attacker with local access to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-23592|2024-04-05T20:46:20.996Z -- lenovo -- synaptics%20fingerprint%20readers
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability was reported in Lenovo devices with Synaptics fingerprint readers that could allow an attacker with physical access to replay fingerprints and bypass Windows Hello authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-23593|2024-06-04T17:45:57.103Z -- lenovo -- windows%207%20and%208%20pc%20preloads
item.description:
A vulnerability was reported
in a system recovery bootloader that was part of the Lenovo preloaded Windows 7 and 8 operating systems from 2012 to 2014
that could allow a privileged attacker with local access to modify the boot manager and escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-23591|2024-02-20T21:47:49.570Z -- lenovo -- thinksystem%20sr670%20v2
item.description:
ThinkSystem SR670V2 servers manufactured from approximately June 2021 to July 2023 were left in Manufacturing Mode which could allow
an attacker with privileged logical access to the host or physical access to server internals to modify or disable Intel Boot Guard firmware integrity, SPS security, and other SPS configuration setting. The server’s NIST SP 800-193-compliant Platform Firmware Resiliency (PFR) security subsystem significantly mitigates this issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-3286|2024-05-16T17:21:21.869Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability was identified in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated user to trigger a device restart by sending a specially crafted web request.

item.title: CVE-2024-2659|2024-04-15T18:00:12.275Z -- lenovo -- smm%2C%20smm2%2C%20fpc
item.description: A command injection vulnerability was identified in SMM/SMM2 and FPC that could allow an authenticated user with elevated privileges to execute system commands when performing a specific administrative function.
